content: loycliff this is a great project to help use up leftover bits and one-of-a-kind dk weight yarn yarn berroco vintage dk 290 yds 265m per 3 5 oz 100 g 53 gms main color 14 gms contrast color color b 4 gms complementary color color c if you want to make a two color hat you will need 18gm in a contrasting color needles and notions us size 4 3 5mm 16 or 18 circular knitting needles and us size 6 4mm 16 or 18 circular knitting needles us size 6 4mm double pointed needles for crown of hat or use magic loop method tapestry needle for finishing optional pom-pom with snap attachment 5 stitch markers guage 25 stitches and 28 row = 4 inches in pattern on larger needles after washing and blocking fits head circumference from 19 to 24 abbreviations knit no stitch ignore ssk slip slip knit slip the first and second stitches one at a time as if to knit then insert point of left-hand needle into the fronts of these 2 stitches and knit them together k2tog knit two together pattern fold-over brim using the main color yarn cast on 120 stitches on to us size 4 3 5mm needles using long tail cast on join to knit in the round being careful not to twist your cast on knit 2 purl 2 ribbing all the way around continue until you have 4 in k2/p2 ribbing if you do not want a fold-over brim then k2/p2 ribbing for 1 5 inches © 2023 sue howlett rev1 2024 body change to us size 6 4mm needles and knit one row placing a stitch marker every 24 stitches you are now ready to start the chart beginning at row 1 there will be 2 plain row of knitting between the end of the brim and the beginning of the color work begin color work using your complementary color yarn color c for row 2 through 7 cut color c use your high contrast color color b beginning on row 10 through 32 at the end of row 32 cut color b continue knitting in the round until row 34 knit one row color c continue as charted using main color and complimentary color color c until row 40 beginning at row 40 you can decide how high you want the crown of your hat for the samples shown i began the decreases on row 42 if you want a more slouchy hat add more plain knit row using the main color continue decreases on either side of your stitch markers until 20 stitches remain changing to double point needles or magic loop when circumference becomes too small when 20 stitches remain break yarn leaving an 8 inch tail using a tapestry needle thread the tail trough the live stiches and draw closed secure the tail end of yarn weave in all ends wash and block before attaching optional pom-pom © 2023 sue howlett
